snippet: Oscar Pistorius surrendered another title in London, this time finishing fourth in the 100 meters behind Jonny Peacock of Britain, who won in 10.90 seconds.
abstract: South African sprinter Oscar Pistorius surrenders another title at the London Paralympics, this time finishing fourth in the 100 meters behind Jonny Peacock of Britain, who wins in 10.90 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius surrendered another title in London, this time finishing fourth in the 100 meters behind Jonny Peacock of Britain, who won in 10.90 seconds.

headline.main: Pistorius Loses in 100 Meters in London
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Loses in 100 Meters in London
